metadata.title: CVE-2020-24020 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in FFMpeg 4.2.3 in dnn_execute_layer_pad inlibavfilter/dnn/dnn_backend_native_layer_pad.c due to a call to memcpywithout length checks, which could let a remote malicious user executearbitrary code.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
